attributes.action: rethink the UKs position of membership of the EU after the admission that EU regulations cost Europe 600 Billion Euros a year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU’s Enterprise Commissioner Gunther Verheugen said in an interview with the FT that EU regulation  cost European businesses 600 Billion Euros a year on the basis of a new evaluation of the cost of EU Administration and regulations whilst the benefits of EU membership betwen 1986 and 2002, were for the EU as a whole 165 billion euros. Surely it is a time to rethink EU membership.
